abstract: Tiger Woods will be vice captain of United States Ryder Cup team in 2016.
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods will join Jim Furyk and Steve Stricker as a vice captain on the United States Ryder Cup team next year at Hazeltine in Minnesota.

headline.main: Woods Is a Ryder Cup Vice Captain
headline.print_headline: Woods Is a Ryder Cup Vice Captain

snippet: Tiger Woods will join Jim Furyk and Steve Stricker as a vice captain on the United States Ryder Cup team next year at Hazeltine in Minnesota.
